# [Interview #689: Alloy of Law Midnight Release, Entry #34](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=689#34)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Expanse of the destinies = a world you know.

#### Footnote

This seems to reference the map of the Shadesmar that is in the
*Stormlight Archive*
.
